sentences.english: The new variety of netted melon Ruilong is bred by a hybrid and an inbred line.
sentences.chinese: 应用三交种育种技术培育出网纹甜瓜新品种“瑞龙”。

sentences.english: Jag har en kiwi och en melon.
sentences.chinese: 我有一个猕猴桃和一个甜瓜。

sentences.english: Ruilong Melon is a new top grade grinding melon variety.
sentences.chinese: 高档网纹厚皮甜瓜新品种。

sentences.english: I'm sorry. Watermelon is out of season. How about cantaloupes ?
sentences.chinese: 对不起，西瓜过时了，甜瓜怎么样？

sentences.english: Suddenly a cantaloupe-size rock tumbled from the truck's load.
sentences.chinese: 突然，一块甜瓜大小的石头从负载的卡车上滚落下来。

sentences.english: He would hold a cut melon to his nostrils for hours.
sentences.chinese: 他会切开一个甜瓜，然后在用鼻子闻上好几个小时。

sentences.english: I’m eating watermelon, melon, mango and persimmons. I just want to have $200.
sentences.chinese: 我在吃西瓜，甜瓜，芒果和柿子。

sentences.english: Melon ( Cucumis melo L. ) is one of a worldwide horticultural crop.
sentences.chinese: 甜瓜是一种世界性的园艺作物。

sentences.english: The eggs even break down the melon's carbs.
sentences.chinese: 鸡蛋甚至可以破坏甜瓜中的碳水化合物。

sentences.english: These melons are real standouts in the vitamin C department.
sentences.chinese: 这些甜瓜在维生素C的王国里占有重要地位。

sentences.english: The light intensity is the main limitative factor of greenhouse production in muskmelon.
sentences.chinese: 光照强度是甜瓜反季节生产的主要限制因子。

sentences.english: Apples and melons are my favourite fruits.
sentences.chinese: 苹果和甜瓜是我喜爱的水果。

sentences.english: The water is an important factor of production in muskmelon.
sentences.chinese: 水是甜瓜生产的重要条件之一。

sentences.english: This paper reports the experimental results of the introduction of Japanese cucumis Melo in Nothern Guangxi.
sentences.chinese: 本文报道日本网纹甜瓜在桂北地区引种结果。

sentences.english: The effects of root-zone hypoxia treatment on nitrogen metabolism in muskmelon seedlings were studied in a hydroponic culture system.
sentences.chinese: 研究了根际低氧处理对网纹甜瓜幼苗氮代谢的影响。

definition: Wade (name)/Sir Thomas Francis Wade (1818-1895), sinologist 威妥瑪|威妥玛[Wei1 Tuo3 ma3]
horseman/cavalryman/knight (i.e. European nobility)/(Tw) bike rider (scooter, bicycle etc)
